entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, London
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:45 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 06:45 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: E 33 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to rain this morning and ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches developing early this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 06:45 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers or drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this evening. A few rain showers beginning this evening then changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle after midnight. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 06:45 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:45 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
